	We are seeking to hire an experienced and detail-oriented AP Executive who will be responsible for managing the company&#39;s outgoing payments to vendors and suppliers.

	Other tasks assigned from time to time.

	Must have basic understanding of accounting principles.
	Must give timely and accurate data.
	Must pay attention to details.
	Must possess good communication skills.
	Good customer service skills.
	Having an accounting professional certification is beneficial.


Salary

Accounts Payable Executive Job at Speedaf Express




        
    

        
        Speedaf was established in 2019. We are a joint-venture company invested by Chinese leading express enterprises. Since founded, we continuously expanded global network, developed and optimized products, improved customer experience, and introduce IT technologies and equipment to realize automatic operations. Currently, we are building a local and cross-border service network to support air, sea and road transportation with the aim to be the leading diversified integrated logistics solution provider between China and emerging markets. By doing so, it will reduce end-to-end logistics costs between China and emerging markets while providing a stable and recognized logistics services to our customers.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Speedaf is localization-oriented, and we believe in creating both opportunities and possibilities of every region we operate in. We work with local teams and understand needs of customers. We offer a variety of products and value added service to cover different commercial or personal scenarios for our customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Payable Executive

Job Location: Berger, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking to hire an experienced and detail-oriented AP Executive who will be responsible for managing the company's outgoing payments to vendors and suppliers.
	This includes processing invoices, ensuring timely payments, reconciling accounts, and maintaining accurate financial records related to accounts payable.


Key Responsibilities


	Reconciliation of operational related vendors.
	Verifying and collating expense reports on operational related vendors.
	Posting and management of invoices Into Account Payable System Using Excel and SAP.
	Proper filling and maintenance of suppliers’ records.
	Reconciliation of bank statement and cash book balance.
	Recognition and classification of operational cost and bookings.
	Prepaid expenses schedule management.
	Reconciling Excel schedule and SAP for transparency.
	Preparation of payroll analysis and schedule.
	Posting of the payroll analysis and schedule on SAP..
	Inventory schedule management and posting with adjustment.
	Other tasks assigned from time to time.


Skills and Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Accounting.
	Must have at least 3 years of experience as an Account Payable Officer/ Executive.
	Must have basic understanding of accounting principles.
	Must give timely and accurate data.
	Must pay attention to details.
	Must possess good communication skills.
	Good customer service skills.
	Having an accounting professional certification is beneficial.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Creative Content Specialist",
  "description": "Agu.ng is a nationally recognized fashion retailer owned and managed by Agurate Online Limited. Agurate Online Limited was incorporated under the Nigerian laws by the Corporate affairs commission in August 2015. We&rsquo;re passionate about Fashion retail both online and offline &ndash; and it goes way beyond fashion.

At Agu.ng, fashion is a way of life. We provide the best fashion materials and accessories. We are located in Onitsha Mall, Enugu mall, Novare mall lekki, Novare Gateway Mall Abuja and Circle mall Osapa. As we strive to bring your lovely fashion to your neighborhood, you can always shop on our website.
We differentiate ourselves through a combination of unique designs and styles merged with unequaled standards of quality and authenticity. Our founders Agurate Online limited is a company built on hard work, fairness and customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Creative Content Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki Phase 1 Lagos,
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	Are you a visual storyteller with a passion for creating dynamic and impactful content?
	We&rsquo;re looking for a Creative Content Specialist who excels in motion graphics, video editing, and visual design to help bring our brand to life across digital platforms.
	The ideal candidate is both strategic and hands-on able to conceptualize ideas, produce engaging multimedia content, and deliver high-quality visual experiences that drive audience engagement and brand growth.


Key Responsibilities


	Edit high-quality video content for social media, ads, and campaigns.
	Create motion graphics, visual effects, and transitions using Adobe After Effects.
	Design social media visuals, video thumbnails, and graphics with Photoshop/Illustrator.
	Collaborate with the marketing team on campaign direction and storytelling.
	Keep up with editing trends, transitions, and viral video formats across platforms.
	Ensure consistent brand tone, color, and quality across all visuals.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree
	3&ndash;5 years of proven experience in creative content development, video editing, and motion graphics
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator).
	Experience in shooting and editing content using professional or mobile equipment is mandatory
	Experience with AI-assisted design toolsis mandatory
	Strong sense of visual composition, storytelling, and design aesthetics.
	Ability to conceptualize and execute ideas from start to finish.
	Experience in shooting and editing content using professional or mobile equipment is an added plus.
	Excellent organizational skills and ability to manage multiple projects under tight deadlines.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1 Lagos,

	Are you a visual storyteller with a passion for creating dynamic and impactful content?
	We’re looking for a Creative Content Specialist who excels in motion graphics, video editing, and visual design to help bring our brand to life across digital platforms.

	Edit high-quality video content for social media, ads, and campaigns.
